labels.label:
ProcessGroup Variables:
1. Environment - Specifies the CommsHub Environment where
the MDD flow is running. (CommsHub DEV/STAGE/QA/PROD)
Route incoming flowfiles based on the Integration Name.

Captures Bulletin Messages(ERROR & WARNING) using
SiteToSiteBulletinReportingTask.
Route on the type of reporting task. (Bulletin or Status)

Captures Flow Level details(Component wise) using
SiteToSiteStatusReportingTask.

Route on each Query performed on the incoming flowfiles.
(Query is done for flowfiles containing Component Status)

entry.value:
${Integration.Name}_INTEGRATION_ALERT

Queue Status Back Pressure Enabled due to ${FlowFiles.Queued.Connection} FlowFiles Queued
Queue Details Queue Id : ${Connection.ID}
Queue Name : ${Connection.Name}
Source ID : ${Source.Processor.ID}
Source Name : ${Source.Processor.Name}
Destination ID : ${Destination.Processor.ID}
Destination Name : ${Destination.Processor.Name}
Flow Details ${Parent.PG.ID}
Timestamp ${Status.Timestamp}
Environment ${TC.Environment}

${Integration.Name}_INTEGRATION_STATUS

Component Details Type : ${Component.Type}
Name : ${Processor.Name}
ID : ${Processor.ID}
Parent ProcessGroup ID : ${Parent.PG.ID}
Data Bytes Read : ${Bytes.Read.Processor}
Bytes Written : ${Bytes.Written.Processor}
Timestamp ${Status.Timestamp}
Environment ${TC.Environment}

${Integration.Name}_INTEGRATION_STATUS

Component Details Type : ${Component.Type}
Name : ${RootProcessor.Name}
ID : ${RootProcessor.ID}
Parent ProcessGroup ID : ${Parent.PG.ID}
Data Bytes Read : ${Bytes.Read.RootProcessor}
Bytes Written : ${Bytes.Written.RootProcessor}
Timestamp ${Status.Timestamp}
Environment ${TC.Environment}

${Integration.Name}_INTEGRATION_ALERT

Queue Status FlowFiles Queued ${FlowFiles.Queued.Connection}
Queue Details Queue Id : ${Connection.ID}
Queue Name : ${Connection.Name}
Source ID : ${Source.Processor.ID}
Source Name : ${Source.Processor.Name}
Destination ID : ${Destination.Processor.ID}
Destination Name : ${Destination.Processor.Name}
Flow Details ${Parent.PG.ID}
Timestamp ${Status.Timestamp}
Environment ${TC.Environment}

${Integration.Name}_INTEGRATION_STATUS

Flow Details ProcessGroup Name : ${PG.Name}
ProcessGroup ID : ${PG.ID}
Data FlowFiles Queued : ${FlowFiles.Queued.PG}
FlowFiles Queued Size : ${FlowFiles.QueueSize.PG}
Bytes Read : ${Bytes.Read.PG}
Bytes Written : ${Bytes.Written.PG}
Timestamp ${Status.Timestamp}
Environment ${TC.Environment}

THREADCONNECT_ROOTLEVEL_STATUS

FlowFiles Queued ${FlowFiles.Queued.Root}
FlowFiles Queued Size ${FlowFiles.QueueSize.Root}
Bytes Read ${Bytes.Read.Root}
Bytes Written ${Bytes.Written.Root}
Active ThreadCount ${Active.ThreadCount.Root}
Timestamp ${Status.Timestamp}
Environment ${TC.Environment}
SELECT * FROM FLOWFILE WHERE componentType = 'ProcessGroup' AND parentId IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM FLOWFILE WHERE componentType = 'Processor' AND parentId IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM FLOWFILE WHERE componentType = 'Connection' AND isBackPressureEnabled = 'true'
SELECT * FROM FLOWFILE WHERE componentType = 'Connection' AND queuedCount > 5000
SELECT * FROM FLOWFILE WHERE componentType = 'Processor' AND parentId IS NULL
SELECT * FROM FLOWFILE WHERE componentType = 'RootProcessGroup' AND parentId IS NULL

${Integration.Name}_INTEGRATION_STATUS

Remote Process Group RPG Id : ${RPG.ID}
RPG Name : ${RPG.Name}
RemotePort Details Active RemotePort : ${Active.RemotePort.Count}
Inactive RemotePort : ${Inactive.RemotePort.Count}
Data Flow Details Recieved Data : ${Recieved.Count}
Recieved Data Size : ${Recieved.ContentSize}
Sent Data : ${Sent.Count}
Sent Data Size : ${Sent.ContentSize}
Timestamp ${Status.Timestamp}
Environment ${TC.Environment}

labels.label:
Route on each Query performed on the incoming flowfiles.
(Query is done for flowfiles containing Bulletin logs)

entry.value:
${Integration.Name}_INTEGRATION_ERROR

INTEGRATION STATUS : ERROR

Error Timestamp ${Error.Timestamp}
Error Description ${Bulletin.Message}
Source Details Source Id : ${Error.Source.ID}
Source Name : ${Error.Source.Name}
Source Type : ${Error.Source.Type}
Flow Name : ${Error.SourcePG.Name}
Environment ${TC.Environment}
SELECT * FROM FLOWFILE WHERE bulletinCategory = 'Log Message' AND (bulletinLevel = 'ERROR' OR bulletinLevel = 'WARNING') AND bulletinGroupId IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM FLOWFILE WHERE bulletinCategory = 'Log Message' AND (bulletinLevel = 'ERROR' OR bulletinLevel = 'WARNING') AND bulletinGroupId IS NULL

${Integration.Name}_INTEGRATION_ERROR

INTEGRATION STATUS : ERROR

Error Timestamp ${Error.Timestamp}
Error Description ${Bulletin.Message}
Source Details Source Id : ${Error.Source.ID}
Source Name : ${Error.Source.Name}
Source Type : ${Error.Source.Type}
Environment ${TC.Environment}
